changes: The proposed plan for 'artwork_2' was 'centered above bed_1'. This was changed to 'Mounted on the right (east) wall, vertically aligned with nightstand_2' to more accurately reflect the visual layout in the image, which is a valid placement that adheres to the Space Optimized style.

refined_placements.nightstand_1: Against the right (east) wall, on the top side of bed_1.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Against the right (east) wall, on the bottom side of bed_1.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Against the left (west) wall, positioned in the lower half of the room.
refined_placements.table_1: Against the left (west) wall, between the kitchenette area and sofa_1.
refined_placements.chair_1: At table_1, pushed in towards the table.
refined_placements.chair_2: At table_1, pushed in towards the table, next to chair_1.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the left (west) wall, centered above sofa_1.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Mounted on the right (east) wall, vertically aligned with nightstand_2.
refined_placements.plant_1: Placed in the corner where the right (east) wall meets the interior wall of the bathroom, next to nightstand_1.
refined_placements.rug_1: On the floor against the bottom (south) wall, under the left window.
refined_placements.rug_2: On the floor against the bottom (south) wall, under the right window.
